source.name: Q12
source.instructions: In a Kubernetes kubeconfig file, the `certificate-authority` field, under `cluster`, is used for:

answers.answer: Certificate authority (CA) file that the Kubernetes API server should use to verify the authenticity of the client (`kubectl`).
Certificate authority (CA) file that the Kubernetes client (`kubectl`) should use to sign the Kubernetes API server certificate.
Certificate authority (CA) file that the Kubernetes API server should use to sign the authenticity of the client (`kubectl`).
Certificate authority (CA) file that the Kubernetes client (`kubectl`) should use to verify the authenticity of the Kubernetes API server.
